Uses of Class
jparsec.math.matrix.Matrix

  • Packages that use Matrix 
    Package Description
    jparsec.ephem
    Provides general classes for basic ephemeris calculation.
    jparsec.math.matrix
    Tools to apply different common math operations with matrices.

    • Uses of Matrix in jparsec.ephem

      Methods in jparsec.ephem that return Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Matrix IAU2006.getGCRS_to_CIRS(TimeElement time, ObserverElement obs, EphemerisElement eph)
      Returns to matrix to transform coordinates in the GCRS (geocentric) to CIRS.
      static Matrix IAU2006.getGCRS_to_ITRS(TimeElement time, ObserverElement obs, EphemerisElement eph)
      Returns to matrix to transform coordinates in the GCRS (geocentric) to ITRS.
      static Matrix IAU2006.getGCRS_to_TIRS(TimeElement time, ObserverElement obs, EphemerisElement eph)
      Returns to matrix to transform coordinates in the GCRS (geocentric) to TIRS.
      static Matrix IAU2006.getNPB(TimeElement time, ObserverElement observer, EphemerisElement eph)
      Returns the Nutation-Precesion-Bias matrix (NPB) for a given instant.
      static Matrix IAU2006.getPolarMotionCorrectionMatrix(TimeElement time, ObserverElement obs, EphemerisElement eph)
      Returns the matrix that corrects positions for polar motion.
